query.mssql: CREATE TABLE {0} (MessageType VARCHAR ( 50 ), DocumentName VARCHAR ( MAX ), SendedFrom VARCHAR( MAX ), Date VARCHAR(50), ReportSessionId VARCHAR (256) NOT NULL )
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE {0} (MessageType citext, DocumentName citext, SendedFrom citext, Date citext, ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL )

query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_ExchangeOrder temp where temp.ReportSessionId = @SessionId
